title: Pokebox
blurb: Add your Pokemon for custom results!

pokemonList.title: Your Custom Pokebox
pokemonList.zero: Add your Pokemon by clicking the box to the left.
pokemonList.zeroDescription: If you already added Pokemon in the past, you may have logged in with a different account. Your accounts will automatically be linked if they use the same email address.
pokemonList.zeroHelp: If they do not have the same email address, {{link}} with the userIds of the accounts you need to link

delete.title: Delete
delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this Pokemon?

deleteAll.title: Delete All
deleteAll.confirmation: This will delete all Pokemon in your Pokebox, are you sure?

import.title: Pokebox Import
import.hintText: Many formats are supported. Make sure to include a header row
import.floatingLabel: Copy and paste your Pokemon here

table.header: Select the Pokemon you wish to import below

full.title: Pokebox - Out of space
full.explanation: You have reached the maximum number of Pokemon for your Pokebox at your current support level. This puts you in the top 5% of Pokebattler users! Pokebattler depends on the support of heavy users like yourself to serve high quality simulations to everyone. You can increase your Pokemon storage by contributing to Pokebattler's Patreon.

explanation: Pokebattler Pokebox is an exciting new feature that lets you customize your Pokebattler experience based on the Pokemon you actually own! The Pokemon you add to your Pokebox can be used throughout the site. Be on the lookout for the box icon. A green icon means you are using the Pokebox, a black icon means you are not.

delete.title: Bulk Delete
delete.blurb: You can quickly delete multiple pokemon at a time here. This is an operation

bulk.title: Delete
bulk.confirmation: This will delete {{num}} Pokemon from your Pokebox, are you sure?
